segments.text: Good morning , Linda . How have you been ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Pretty bad . I ’ Ve had a bad cold for three days and still can ’ t get rid of it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m sorry to hear that . Is there anything else I can do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I hope you ’ ll feel better soon .
segments.speaker: S1
